title: Hearty Italian meatball lasagne
ingredients: ['For the small meatballs', '400g stale white bread', '200ml lukewarm milk', '500g minced meat, such as pork and veal', '5 eggs, beaten', '150g grated mixed cheese, such as Parmesan and Pecorino', '2 gloves garlic, minced', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper, as needed', 'vegetable oil for frying', 'For the tomato sauce', '2 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2kg tinned tomato', 'Other ingredients', '500g fresh or pre-cooked lasagne sheets', '250g mozzarella, roughly chopped', '400g ricotta', '400g green peas', '500g prepared bechamel sauce, bought or homemade', '6 boiled eggs, sliced', '200g grated Parmesan cheese']
